unnormalised: Arrey yaar, corporate law mhunnllear kitlem dokheaddukhi! Mhojea ixttachea company-k Companies Act-ache Sec 134 pallunk nasleacho notice ailo. Dislem mhunnllear, tannim aple financial statements velecher file korunk nasle, zachi nimnni tarikh 30/09/2023 asli. Atam te Adv. Sharma-k sodunk bhonvtat tem sarkhem korunk, warna bhari dন্ড, bhai! Hem sogllem kitlem জটিল assa, na?
normalised: Arrey yaar, corporate law mhantlear dokem dukhta! Mhojea ixttache companik Companies Act-achea section ekso chovisache palon na korchea khatir notice ailya. Dislem, tanim aple financial statements thik zatiche tarikhek meren bhorunk na, ji tis September don hazar teis asli. Atam te Advocate Sharma-kaddlean tem sarkhem korunk sodtat, warna mottea zoriwaneo, bhai! Hem soglle kitlench gunthalgunthichem asa, na?
